markdownParagraphs: This mini-site is a demonstration of a [single-page application](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Single-page_application) I am creating using AngularJS.
For a more complex page that illustrates responsive web design, see the [profiles](#/profiles) page.
I have listed a bunch of useful [resources](#/resources) I have found along the way.
And for further information describing technical capabilities this site illustrates, see [about](#/about).
The full source is available on [github](https://github.com/mcalthrop/angular-spa-demo).
**Note:** this is a work in progress; you can see [what's in the pipeline](https://github.com/mcalthrop/angular-spa-demo#pipeline).
